pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Relax name checking, warn and modify frame names in Model, World Load

content.raw:
tl;dr Ok, let's keep it like this

---

Ok, yeah it fails on SDF8 too. But it feels a bit too extreme not to load the whole world because of that, no? This concern goes beyond this case though, I think any errors loading a model will end up failing the world.

In any case, just as a reference, Gazebo-classic allowed homonymous sibling links. It has a bunch of silent failures as a consequence though.
content.html:
tl;dr Ok, let's keep it like this

Ok, yeah it fails on SDF8 too. But it feels a bit too extreme not to load the whole world because of that, no? This concern goes beyond this case though, I think any errors loading a model will end up failing the world.

In any case, just as a reference, Gazebo-classic allowed homonymous sibling links. It has a bunch of silent failures as a consequence though.
